name: Cubist
introduce: Cubist is a developer tools and infrastructure company bringing modern software engineering practices and first-class security to web3 builders. Cubist’s toolkit makes it safe and easy to build, test and deploy multi-chain and cross-chain dapps in automated pipelines that handle keys and sequencing. With a few lines of configuration, developers can use Cubist to switch bridge providers and chains, spin up private testnets and funded test accounts, do simulation testing and more.
